options.content:
Health Check & Infrastructure

Jenkins Enterprise | CloudBees CI

Notes

  • Datasources: Prometheus, Loki
  • Metrics: Jenkins Metrics plugin formatted by CloudBees Prometheus Plugin, kube-state-metrics
  • The Dashboars is compatible with CloudBees CI HA/HS
